data.message: Can't say shit without being called a racist by some dumb fuck. All i gotta say is your lucky im not by you bitch. Fuck your too stupid to even burn!!

replies.message: I think it's "you're" but what do I know?  I'm too stupid.  It is racist to say I can't date blacks and I think I'm black.  Far from it - I'm proud of my Ukrainian heritage.  If be happy to fund your trip here when I save money and show you my DC and you can show me NW and Georgetown.  At least you didn't call Obama the N word.  I'm too stupid to burn...?  Elaborate?  All witches burn.
What!!!!?? I never said you can't date black men, i said that you are dick sick, you imbecile!! Wow im done cause "you're" hurting my brain with stupidity.

Well you dolt, I'm sure you graduated from a private college on loans with honors.  You said I had black dick and forgot I was white as if there is something wrong with having black dick, therefore, you are racist.  Go to temple or church and pray on it.
